data.text:
Many natural & cultural heritage sites around the world are currently threatened by the climate crisis.

On Monday's International Day for Monuments & Sites, find out how @UNESCO is taking #ClimateAction to protect World Heritage: https://t.co/aIben8a8Fw https://t.co/ygvFV0Tr4D

🐝Bees are our tiny food heroes: without them most of the food we eat wouldn't exist. 

⚠️But bees are in danger and beekeepers around the world are working to protect them.

👩‍🌾🐝More from @FAO on these unsung heroes. https://t.co/BDQobI7BF7

https://t.co/FTiafVXNSC

Conflict, #COVID19 & the climate crisis have created unprecedented challenges. 

How we can build a more resilient future will be discussed at this week's @IMFNews - @WorldBank Spring Meetings. https://t.co/a3hLWxKbm0

https://t.co/j8oZ9DdQ8A

Working from home can:
🙋 improve work-life balance
🚗 reduce traffic & air pollution 
🏭 lower costs

Yet, it can also lead to isolation, burnout, depression & other challenges. 

@ILO & @WHO have tips on maintaining balance while teleworking. https://t.co/1V2mzqY7Qx

The UN works for everyone, everywhere by: 
🇺🇳 vaccinating children
🇺🇳 protecting refugees
🇺🇳 feeding the hungry
🇺🇳 addressing the climate emergency
🇺🇳 empowering women
🇺🇳 responding to crises & much more.

https://t.co/LI4LBEykhV https://t.co/kRxZ22slH7

The climate emergency can seem daunting, but we have the solutions to solve this crisis. 

From renewable energy to green technologies & individual #ClimateAction steps, all of us can #ActNow to help protect our planet & our future. 
https://t.co/DjWt4R9F2K https://t.co/yr28O8tjEq

The #GlobalGoals are our blueprint to achieve a better & more sustainable world.

Learn more about the 17 Goals created to transform our future. https://t.co/Ss4uMcXdcV https://t.co/cw5A9KPSrH

Attacks on journalists are attacks on freedom of expression. 

Now, more than ever, we need facts and press freedom. 

Defending journalism is standing up for democracy. https://t.co/TR9XEVaSdQ via @UNESCO https://t.co/QdQ9uP3SIh

The war in Ukraine is supercharging a food, energy & finance crisis that is pummeling some of the world’s most vulnerable people, countries & economies.

-- @antonioguterres has called for global & systemic solutions to the emergency this week. https://t.co/sOzvgCQhyz https://t.co/Y9AEabZySp

When a @UNPeacekeeping mission is formed, women & men #ServingForPeace leave their families behind to protect the most vulnerable and help create the conditions for lasting peace. 

More about their important work: https://t.co/1AkYG74EeJ https://t.co/bPUm7MxbUY

Hate speech online can cause harm in real life. 

Say #NoToHate: 
💠 Make your social feeds a no hate zone.
💠 Check facts before sharing.
💠 Tackle hate by sharing messages of tolerance & equality. 
💠 Support those targeted by hate speech. https://t.co/UpEyttnNNl

Strong women can help inspire strong girls - and together, we can all help achieve #GenerationEquality.

@UN_Women works to promote gender equality around the world. https://t.co/9DkJpsP6x9 https://t.co/7nvBwCeQ76

The UN is helping people affected by the war in Ukraine by providing:

🔹 protection & shelter for refugees
🔹 support for children & families
🔹 food & water
🔹 healthcare & much more. 

https://t.co/eX16SnexeC https://t.co/699KKTTKoR

We wish our followers who are celebrating a happy #Easter. 

Through solidarity, people of all faiths can and will get through times of crisis – with cooperation and belief in our common humanity. https://t.co/RggK1R8Tww

#VaccinesWork

They help prevent millions of deaths every year and are continuously monitored to ensure they are safe & effective.

More facts from @WHO: https://t.co/UUx1Hwm6k3 https://t.co/iqxtVshxkt

Healthier ecosystems 🌊 🌿 = healthier planet 🌍 = healthier people 👥

There has never been a more urgent need to revive damaged ecosystems than now. 

Join #GenerationRestoration: https://t.co/hzVHbZgWeD via 
@UNEP

Every day, in every corner of the world, the dedicated women & men of the United Nations strive for peace, dignity & equality on a healthy planet. 

Find out more about how the UN responds to crises & helps the most vulnerable. https://t.co/28z7VGTtIx

17.4 million people are food insecure in Yemen -- a situation that is expected to worsen due to the war in Ukraine.

Learn about how @WFP is working to help people in the world's worst humanitarian crisis. https://t.co/tc8gx5bz7p #YemenCantWait https://t.co/mUxwfJMn1c

Women & girls in Afghanistan were already facing grave challenges brought on by conflict, drought, #COVID19 & more.

Now, additional movement restrictions & lack of access to education brings new risks to their safety & well-being. https://t.co/td77QKXs6U via @Refugees https://t.co/awoQh81wvC

“More than ever, older persons need stronger protection to fully enjoy their human rights.”

-- @UNHumanRights chief @mbachelet warns that legal frameworks – which should protect everybody, without discrimination – still render older persons invisible. https://t.co/3sjoyPBo74 https://t.co/2qswKmTAvJ

The shrinking of Arctic sea ice affects marine ecosystems and ocean circulation and can potentially impact weather events.

+1.5°C = ice-free summer every 100 years.
+2°C = ice-free summer every 20 years.

Every fraction of a degree matters. https://t.co/CDodr6OuCK via @UNFCCC https://t.co/lfBKNdsoDj

Indigenous women play key roles in their communities & beyond.

Join us in standing with indigenous women & girls as they strive for their rights & a seat at the table where decisions are made. #WeAreIndigenous via @UN_Women https://t.co/gK2HEk26kW

We rely on nature for our survival. 

Yet, human activity has altered almost 75% of Earth’s surface, constricting & displacing wildlife and nature. 

The #GlobalGoals are the answer to declining biodiversity & degraded ecosystems. 🌳 https://t.co/QCEKAVOItV https://t.co/nr404AVlNN

Somalia: Millions of people at risk of sliding into famine as poor rain, skyrocketing food prices & huge funding shortfalls destroy lives & livelihoods.
Aid has reached almost 2 million people, but additional funding is required to help all those in need. 
https://t.co/xE1dQsEc5i https://t.co/jcwR7ZPCuJ

Use your actions - and your voice - to influence change.

Speak up & urge your elected officials, your city & local businesses to take urgent #ClimateAction.

@UNEP has more ideas for ways you can #ActNow: 
https://t.co/iBuWL97nZ0 https://t.co/i9Tk5HiHrY

Culture knows no boundaries -- and in times of crisis, we need culture & artists more than ever.

Friday is #WorldArtDay. https://t.co/4VKoGBme1m via @UNESCO https://t.co/japCvCcpdM

Ukraine: From providing protection & shelter for refugees to offering psychosocial support for children & families, the UN is fully mobilized to help those impacted by the war. 

Learn more about our efforts and how you can help support the response. https://t.co/eX16Snw86a https://t.co/iIR2j3HzVW

Art nurtures creativity, innovation & cultural diversity.

🎨 On Friday's #WorldArtDay, join @UNESCO in calling for further support for artists of all disciplines & access to culture for all. https://t.co/4VKoGBDPpW https://t.co/ZQEjuKdqsP

"Yemen will need the international community’s support as much as ever to maintain the momentum & move toward finding an inclusive, peaceful & sustainable end to the conflict."

-- UN Special Envoy @OSE_Yemen Hans Grundberg to Security Council amid truce. https://t.co/hqyBXhyXpL

"Do unto others as you would have them do unto you" -- the 'Golden Rule' mosaic at UNHQ is based on the painting by US artist Norman Rockwell.

On Friday's #WorldArtDay, we celebrate the power of art to provide comfort in times of crisis & difficulty. https://t.co/4VKoGBme1m https://t.co/tDeZJ6ORX1

"By taking a breath before sharing on social media & also encouraging others to pause, we can allow the facts to dominate in the fog of war."

-- @MelissaFleming on the importance of individual action in countering misinformation amid the war in Ukraine.
https://t.co/ZEjuPJnEAZ https://t.co/wKpkZ9c9H9

Ethiopia: A @WFP led humanitarian convoy of trucks with food & other essential items, and fuel tankers is delivering life-saving supplies to communities in Tigray. 

More on the work being done throughout the country: https://t.co/dXsfxBOzh3 https://t.co/6ljjhbfe0R

Coral reefs cover only 0.2% of the seafloor, but are home to more than 25% of all marine life.

Higher ocean temperatures are triggering widespread coral stress & bleaching.

We need #ClimateAction now to save coral reefs. https://t.co/8YUDpyxq9z via @UNEP
https://t.co/XjYFmGmcx6

Chagas is a tropical disease caused by parasites that affects around 6-7 million people, mostly in Latin America. 

With prompt treatment, the disease is curable.

More from @WHO on Thursday's #WorldChagasDay: https://t.co/4MvxSoIkfC https://t.co/2MJ0SohVOp

"We need to silence the guns & accelerate negotiations towards peace, now. 
For the people of Ukraine. 
For the people of the region. 
And for the people of the world."

@antonioguterres warns of global impacts of war in Ukraine on food, energy & finance. 
https://t.co/2MdTdfrqEd

Millions of displaced families across eastern Africa are at risk of falling deeper into hunger.

UN humanitarians warn that food rations are dwindling due to ongoing crises, and without additional support, they will be unable to help all those in need. https://t.co/sGGy8VBHhc

This war must end. 

The people of Ukraine cannot bear the violence being inflicted on them.

The most vulnerable people around the globe cannot become collateral damage in yet another disaster for which they bear no responsibility.  

-- @antonioguterres. https://t.co/sOzvgCQhyz https://t.co/ur7CQBVMvR

As crises continue around the world, greater accountability is needed to deliver justice for survivors of conflict-related sexual violence & to prevent future crimes from taking place. https://t.co/nIgaCVXLkE

A cluster bomb consists of many bomblets which are scattered over wide areas, posing danger to civilians long after conflict ends.  

110 States are parties to the Convention on Cluster Munitions, which prohibits their use under any circumstances. https://t.co/yqRXnzmnqx https://t.co/w13Mujf8x0

The war in Ukraine is supercharging a food, energy & finance crisis that is pummeling some of the world’s most vulnerable people, countries & economies.

-- @antonioguterres, calling for global & systemic solutions to the emergency. https://t.co/sOzvgD7SX9 https://t.co/XoK9fNyiEu

The war in Ukraine has displaced millions of people.

At support centres for families with children, including this one in Mukachevo, @UNICEF is providing psychosocial kits filled with toys & educational items. https://t.co/KA9opcxlqV https://t.co/vMq2VsxdTh

Every day, in every corner of the world, the dedicated women & men of the United Nations strive for peace, dignity & equality on a healthy planet. 

Find out more about how the UN responds to crises & helps the most vulnerable. https://t.co/28z7VGTtIx

Calling young filmmakers! 📽️

The @Pluralplus Youth Video Festival is looking for short films showcasing the importance of peace, diversity, social inclusion, solidarity & more.

Details: https://t.co/U3Iipv4WB4 #PLURALplus22 https://t.co/CldbykAjBi

The war in Ukraine is putting the fragile #COVID19 recovery of global trade in jeopardy. 

More on the latest projections from @wto, including new assessment that shows how the downward trends will impact people around the world. https://t.co/6AWqOiLqr3

"Colombia’s peace is invaluable. We must continue to build it and protect it in order to ensure its success – for the sake of Colombia and for the example it offers to the world."

-- @MisionONUCol head @CGRuizMassieu tells Security Council. https://t.co/0KieWen4Ik

Somalia: Millions at risk of famine as impacts of prolonged drought destroy lives & livelihoods.

Humanitarians have reached almost 2 million people, but say additional funding required to help all those in need. https://t.co/EI0Hgi2Eqg https://t.co/8BulsmKknc

Without affordable, stable finance, developing countries will not be able to rebound from #COVID19 or achieve the #GlobalGoals.

Ensuring countries have access to sufficient resources is essential to recover better. https://t.co/KfJQzBPixG #Fin4Dev https://t.co/i10yXxisUa

Ukraine: @WHO has documented more than 100 attacks on health care since the start of the war.

Civilians and civilian infrastructure are #NotATarget. https://t.co/xGEYsTDsBx https://t.co/ryuWyMZ4FS

The world was already facing an unprecedented hunger crisis before the Russian invasion of Ukraine.

Now, @WFP estimates an additional 47 million people could be pushed into acute hunger if the war continues past April. https://t.co/E4SSpjHGFh https://t.co/FWh2dwRXyY
On Tuesday's International Day of Human Space Flight, @UNOOSA explains how space science, technology & exploration contribute to the #GlobalGoals. https://t.co/v36eaDNBkU https://t.co/97rSXaP2Oa

“There can be no tolerance for rape and other forms of sexual violence and no impunity for the perpetrators."

In Ukraine, @UNFPA chief @Atayeshe has called for urgent investigations and additional funding to protect women & girls caught up in the war. https://t.co/cUvxYFtRKc https://t.co/KGlaU9Nab7

On this day 61 years ago, the first human space flight took place -- a historic event that opened the way for space exploration for the benefit of all humanity.

More on Tuesday's International Day of Human Space Flight 👨‍🚀👩‍🚀🚀: https://t.co/sxDXZztm0c https://t.co/hMpWXQWs4M

Timely action & funding needed to prevent a decaying tanker anchored close to Yemen’s coastline from creating a major oil spill.

UN officials warn that a spill would have devastating ecological & humanitarian consequences for the region & beyond.
https://t.co/E2GSVqCDHR

"The combination of mass displacement with the large presence of conscripts & mercenaries & the brutality displayed against Ukrainian civilians has raised all red flags."

--@UNWomenChief on risks faced by women & children due to war in Ukraine. https://t.co/e5UaaSV4G7 https://t.co/nVcGBu6ClZ

The war in Ukraine has left millions struggling to meet their basic needs, with 9 out of 10 Ukrainians at risk of falling into poverty.

@UNDP is committed to supporting vulnerable people in the country with immediate & longer-term economic assistance. https://t.co/7w854g5onH

Finding #WomenInPolitics shouldn't be this hard. 

We need more women leaders for a better, more equal world. https://t.co/7qNXg774cO via @UN_women https://t.co/Tp1ONC8SIX

At this very moment, thousands of refugees and internally displaced families  are struggling to provide the most basic needs for their children.

This #Ramadan, you can donate your Zakat at https://t.co/0qCHMu84Oz. #EveryGiftCounts via @Refugees https://t.co/l2yLmw3GUR

Amid a growing tide of crises around the world, many are seeking to understand the UN & how member countries shape our work. 

From the role of the Security Council to the procedures of the #UNGA, check out these useful questions & answers. https://t.co/gbiwXbgBjL

Are you a young journalist looking to cover this year’s #UNGA & more? 

You may be eligible for a @unraf fellowship. Find out more: https://t.co/m5tkuFjXDJ https://t.co/McHALk91Z8

Diversity makes us better.

Racism is a stain on our societies & many inequalities were worsened by the #COVID19 pandemic. 

Learn how @UNDP is working to end discrimination and #FightRacism to ensure everyone, everywhere can reach their full potential. https://t.co/PMGABnN7rM https://t.co/nc27CwquvG

Every day, in every corner of the world, the dedicated women & men of the United Nations strive for peace, dignity & equality on a healthy planet. 

Find out more about how the UN responds to crises & helps the most vulnerable. https://t.co/28z7VHb4A5

The UN is made up of dedicated women & men around the world who:

🇺🇳 Feed the hungry
🇺🇳 Vaccinate children
🇺🇳 Promote development
🇺🇳 Protect civilians
🇺🇳 Mediate conflicts
🇺🇳 Support refugees & migrants
🇺🇳 Advance human rights
🇺🇳 Stay & deliver to give hope to those in need https://t.co/u2URMMbXUm

When Holocaust distortion is left unchallenged, it can lead to Holocaust denial, antisemitism, conspiracy myths & dangerous forms of nationalism.

We can all do our part to #ProtectTheFacts about the Holocaust. https://t.co/uJ3Y1FoTkg https://t.co/r1ppnOfU87

“Each and every one of us has a role to play in averting the climate crisis."

-- @UNICEF Youth Advocate @_ashlash calls for a global #ClimateAction movement. https://t.co/QlL9tWKQFz https://t.co/Gwthe99HxB

UNHQ in NYC is open to the public again. 

You can #VisitUN and take a guided tour with one of our multilingual guides if you are fully vaccinated & have pre-booked your ticket here: https://t.co/Hsgap5RWBM https://t.co/f0D1x1xH30

The war in Ukraine has made it difficult for patients to access vital healthcare services, including HIV treatment.

@UNAIDS & partners are working to distribute life-saving HIV medicines & services to those affected by conflict. https://t.co/t1E9xFlVsD https://t.co/B9BUiMgPqO

What we share online can have consequences in the real world.

There is a lot of misinformation spreading right now, which can result in people being left uninformed & can put lives at risk during a crisis.

#PledgeToPause and verify facts before sharing. https://t.co/qFqoh7loX2 https://t.co/oT1kZCTRgE

"We have the power to regain control. 
 We have the power to secure the future of life on earth. 
 The time to do so is now."

--  UN Global Communications chief @MelissaFleming explains why the case for renewable energy has never been stronger. 
https://t.co/ui6EPM02dk

Every day, in every corner of the world, the dedicated women & men of the United Nations strive for peace, dignity & equality on a healthy planet. 

Find out more about how the UN responds to crises & helps the most vulnerable. https://t.co/28z7VHb4A5

War is not the answer.

We need peace.

Peace for the world.

Peace now. https://t.co/rPnWCSIYIm

The war in Ukraine is severely affecting the livelihoods of the country's farmers.

As one of the largest agricultural producers globally, the impacts of the disruptions will be felt worldwide.  

More on how @FAO is helping: https://t.co/huDSCp5tSw https://t.co/oVGvsN3cd0

⛈️Weather forecasting systems
🌳Tree nurseries
🌱Resource protection plans
📝Lost crop insurance

As vulnerable communities bear the brunt of the climate crisis, see how @WFP is helping them adapt and taking #ClimateAction for a better future. https://t.co/k421OgLYM7 https://t.co/WlehbcSzaa

The war in Ukraine could lead to a malnutrition crisis for millions of children in other parts of the world.

@UNICEF says the combination of rising food prices & decreased supplies will severely impact children in the Middle East & North Africa. https://t.co/bky8EkzI9D

The UN is helping people affected by the war in Ukraine by providing:

🔹 protection & shelter for refugees
🔹 support for children & families
🔹 food & water
🔹 healthcare & much more. 

https://t.co/eX16SnexeC https://t.co/PndCHZpvGe

Ukraine: Following a missile attack on a train station that killed dozens of civilians, including children, the UN is reiterating its urgent call for ceasefire to allow people to move to safety & to facilitate delivery of life-saving aid. https://t.co/5EFi2ZoRhL

🔹 Humanity
🔹 Neutrality
🔹 Impartiality
🔹 Independence

These 4 principles guide the UN's humanitarian work.

https://t.co/j2xELzTSGZ via @UNOCHA

 https://t.co/kCI0BNMwI0

"Roma fleeing persecution & conflict – most immediately today from Ukraine – have the same rights & must be extended the same solidarity as other refugees."

-- @antonioguterres on Friday's #RomaDay. https://t.co/LbVLv9nJG6 https://t.co/sGFRZH0Zxg

A cluster bomb consists of many bomblets which are scattered over wide areas, posing danger to civilians long after conflict ends.  

110 States are parties to the Convention on Cluster Munitions, which prohibits their use under any circumstances. https://t.co/yqRXnzmnqx https://t.co/kJdmbbIgga

Civilians and civilian infrastructure are #NotATarget. 

They must be protected. 

At all times. https://t.co/NZNdomCR0q

1,500 children are living in Kharkiv's metro as they seek safety from the war in Ukraine. 

Many have been there for more than a month.

See how @UNICEF is supporting their mental health through art, toys & games. https://t.co/mxr7pC4Tfv

https://t.co/BXF0H6tCzd

Join Friday's global virtual event for #WorldAutismAwarenessDay on inclusive quality education for all. 

Details: https://t.co/RuQIeTeyKG https://t.co/hWNLIkCmYt

📸: #FBF to the original manuscript of the UN Charter from 1945. 

The use of force by one country against another is wrong and against the Charter.

The values of the Charter must prevail.

https://t.co/swaalYquKT https://t.co/wlrtB55RTB

Afghanistan: Around 85 babies are born every day at the Malalai Maternity Hospital in Kabul.

Despite the country's ongoing humanitarian crisis, @UNFPA is continuing to provide life-saving reproductive and protection care for women. https://t.co/facwguAioB https://t.co/9Xax0rSuY4

On Thursday, the UN commemorates the 28th anniversary of the genocide against the Tutsi in Rwanda, honouring those who were murdered and reflecting on the suffering of those who survived. https://t.co/4laKpTv4Yf https://t.co/b6WW4eQZnt

Ukraine: @UNReliefChief calls for independent investigation into deaths in Bucha following his visit to devastated city.

As war continues, humanitarians mobilize aid convoys to reach people in hardest hit areas with food, medicine & other essential items. https://t.co/WdWuG5WtDT

On Thursday, the General Assembly expressed grave concern at the human rights & humanitarian crisis in Ukraine

#UNGA adopted a resolution calling for Russia to be suspended from the Human Rights Council. 
https://t.co/5kpgdWTsVl

"We must say no to hate speech & xenophobia & reject the forces of polarization, nationalism & protectionism."

-- @antonioguterres reflects on the 28th anniversary of the genocide against the Tutsi in Rwanda. https://t.co/2Me4hCzLay #NoToHate https://t.co/hLUS1ap147

Amid #COVID19, the climate emergency & other crises, urgent action is needed to keep people & the planet healthy.

On Thursday's #WorldHealthDay, see how @WHO is working towards a healthier future for all. https://t.co/IPewHJzKi0 https://t.co/D9dZ4CvpUC

NEWS: #UNGA adopts historic resolution suspending the membership of Russia to the Human Rights Council and expressing grave concern at the ongoing human rights & humanitarian crisis in Ukraine. https://t.co/8c6gdOv5RO https://t.co/NwSJ2IfM3V

On Thursday, #UNGA resumes its Emergency Special Session on the war in Ukraine. 

Watch live here: https://t.co/CWxzlVzLsE https://t.co/PpyDQ0g1wZ

The Human Rights Council reviews the human rights records of all 193 UN member countries — the only process of this kind in existence. 

Follow @UN_HRC for more. https://t.co/Vw8PCZgkvP https://t.co/nOWV0rKtq3

28 years after the genocide against the Tutsi in Rwanda, see the faces and hear the stories of survivors on Thursday's International Day of Reflection. https://t.co/x0tUxsfhjq #Kwibuka https://t.co/eJXjWnAoZP

Thursday is #WorldHealthDay.

From walking or cycling to work, to buying food locally and quitting smoking -- we can all take action for a #HealthierTomorrow.

More from @WHO. https://t.co/NKCLdEgNB6 https://t.co/T9zNtYmnYJ

"Let us pay meaningful tribute to the Rwandans who perished by building a future of dignity, tolerance, and human rights for all."

-- @antonioguterres on Thursday's 28th anniversary of the genocide against the Tutsi in Rwanda. https://t.co/v1iGGj95fj #Kwibuka https://t.co/y2pMbv1Y3s

Every minute, 13 people die due to complications from air pollution, including lung cancer, heart disease & strokes.

Ending the use of fossil fuels like oil, coal & natural gas can create a healthier future for all. 

Thursday is #WorldHealthDay: https://t.co/NKCLdEyoZG via @WHO https://t.co/5x5Kisc677

More than one million people perished in the 1994 genocide against the Tutsi in Rwanda.

On Thursday's International Day of Reflection, we honour those who were murdered and reflect on the suffering of those who survived. https://t.co/4WmX5Q2N0l #Kwibuka https://t.co/ejZyXjbKXi

Welcome to the new Co-Chairs of the @SDGAdvocates: Prime Minister of Barbados @miaamormottley & Prime Minister of Canada @JustinTrudeau. 

They are joining a group of inspiring people raising awareness about the #GlobalGoals. 
https://t.co/mo5ka0lRtu
